task.title: How to Start the Calculator App
task.shortdesc: Here you will find information on how to start the Calculator app on your mobile phone.

prereq.p: To use the calculator app, you need to unlock your phone first.

context.p: You can use a calculator app on your smart phone. You will find it useful, when you need to quickly calculate some numbers.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Calculator application icon.

result.p: The application starts. You are now ready to calculate with it.

taskbody.example: For example, if you have purchased a book for 5$ and you have given 10$, how much change should you expect? Answer is 10-5=5 $ change.
